name: Lofi Maker
description:
Lofi Maker is a proof-of-concept prototype for a warm and cozy lofi ambience-making game. Drag and drop different decorations into your room and customize it: with each room configuration there is a different instrument track associated! Mix and match to create your very own lofi beat to match your cozy lofi bedroom. Have Lofi Maker run in the background to have Lofi Girl accompany you as you complete your tasks of the day!

Stay cozy!
